td.div:
English: A colored Emoji from Noto project, released under Apache license
Unicode name: Waving hand sign Annotations: Body, Hand, Human, Wave, Waving

tr.td: The source code of this SVG is valid.
This vector graphics image was created with Adobe Illustrator.

div.div:
This file contains additional information, such as Exif metadata, probably added from the digital camera or scanner used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details may not fully reflect the modified file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
